ANNUAL MODEL PICKLEBALL TOURNAMENT
DESIGNERS APPLY NOW
At Fusion Fashion Events, we create more than just shows; we curate experiences where brands can truly shine. Immersive experiences designed to highlight the artistry behind every collection, blending fashion, art, and music in a way that resonates with audiences and industry insiders alike. It’s a space where designers’ visions are brought to life, leaving a lasting impression on those who experience it.

SWIM WEEK BRINGS OUT THE BEST GLOBAL TALENT
2025 has brought on more attention and traffic to Miami year over year, including the talent participating. Global impact from the world's favorite city.
LIVE MUSIC PERFORMANCES IGNITE THE EVENT VIBES
Miami artists such as Hoosh, Leli Hernandez, and many more have performed at past Fusion Swim Week's. This year's lineup will bring South Beach a memorable show.
IMMERSE YOURSELF IN ART & THE CULTURE OF MIAMI
A Fusion Fashion Event stems from a strong sense of community. Art is in everything we do from music to fashion to the culinary arts. Expect more activations this year.
